1.content:
After having been sent home from a terrible day of everything that went on, you noticed there was a device in your room, and seeing no one was around you activate it wondering what it does. As it shined bright and then fell apart, you then awake but small.

which choice will you pick below for waking up at.
1.title: Starting off the day?

11.content:
You wake up still in reality and in your house but then you noticed that someone's stuff was on the floor as you sat up you looked around and saw three figures one on the couch, one in the kitchen and one looking right at you.


Who are they?
11.title: Reality

choices: Licks you as her tummy rumbled
Tell the other two what she found
111.content:
You saw that you were in the room with three of your friend's sisters, you had no idea what was going on but you felt weird, you then recall one of them saying they were going to come over with two other's. You saw one of them was looking at you and you knew she was only 10 years old and her name was Sally, cute yes hungry yes nice....not to you. You then looked at the couch and saw Lucy who you knew was 15 she would always stalk you no matter what you did.

And then there's Lilly who was in the kitchen she was only 9 you had no idea why you were stuck with these three but had to get out of there, but you knew you had to babysit them but seeing you were now tiny again, you had to try to make it off the menu.

Suddenly Sally grabs you and stands up and then.
111.title: three friend's sisters

12.content: Where and when do you wake up at in the fiction world?
12.title: Fiction

121.content: Which Anime will you pick? Make it a good one or you know it doesn't matter.
121.title: Animes

choices: Climb up her leg and into her outfit
You can't get her attention she already see's you
12111.content: You awoken in a weird shop as you looked around to see where you were as you looked up you noticed a girl standing there, you couldn't believe your eyes on who it was standing before you. It was none other then Ruby Rose, you noticed she had a magazine on weapons and had headphones on that must mean you're in the very first episode of RWBY, you need to get her attention somehow.
12111.title: The start of it all

choices: You don't Ruby takes you out and shows you to her sister Yang
Ruby remembers you and takes you out to show you to Glynda Goodwitch
121112.content:
As you looked up you saw that Ruby was looking right down at you, and luckily Roman and his gang didn't show up yet.

"Psst." You said waving your hands. "I know you can't hear me with those head phones on, but pick me up please."

Ruby raised an eyebrow and didn't hear what you said as she knelt down and picked you up and looked at you funny.

You were about to say something as you heard the door open to the dust shop. "Oh crap." You thought as you then hid in Ruby's pouch on her belt and remain silent.

Things then play out normally as you felt Ruby moving which was normal for the episode to go, you decided to wait it out.

How long do you remain hidden?
121112.title: You can't get her attention she already see...

12112.content:
You wake up in a room that had four bunk beds that were uneven as you looked around to get a good idea where you were at, you then heard the door open and you saw someone walk in and you knew who it was and where you were.


Who walks in?
12112.title: The action is too strong

121123.content: Okay what about one of these two? Plus it really doesn't have to be any member of team RWBY so.
121123.title: Next

1212.content: Which character's room do you end up in?
1212.title: Sailor Moon

choices: Yes you are katnip on Luna's menu
No Usagi comes home in time
12121.content:
You wake up in a room as you rub your head like something had hit you, you look around and noticed the different things in the room. You then heard someone talking as you remain still.

Luna crawls groggily back into Usagi's room for a rest.
"Stupid Usagi, always getting up late..." she mumbles as she heads for the bed "Ugh, how did such a dummy end up with the responsibilities she has?"

You still didn't move not wanting to be found. "Jeez what's going on?" You're startled as Luna hops up on the bed to get comfortable, but her ears perk up as she notices an unfamiliar scent. Which was coming from you.

"Huh?" Luna said and whips around and spots you "A mouse?" She lumbers towards you to sniff you.
"Hm, not a mouse... but you sure smell like one. Who are you?" she asks, glaring at you suspiciously.

You were not sure what was going on but you knew where you were and that Luna was looking right at you, you try to find the words to say but the only thing that came out was. "Don't.....mouse, human here must be dreaming?"

Luna shakes her head. "It's not a dream," She sniffs you some more "Hm, you smell very mousey. Mind telling me how you ended up here, this small and this... hm, nice-smelling?"

You didn't know what to say in fact you were speechless to what was going on, where you about to be cat food for a magical cat? "I don't know what you're talking about smell but it's a long story on how I got here really."

"That's it? Hm... well, if you don't mind..." Luna lies down "You smell like a mouse, you're the size of a mouse... and, it seems like you have the memory of a mouse! So, I hope you don't mind if I treat you like a mouse~" She opens her maw wide and pins you down with her paw.

You begin to struggle trying to break free from Luna's grasp. Is this your final destination into the stomach of a cat?
12121.title: Snack for Luna the cat? 0_0 Oh boy

choices: Yes you remain inside her belly the whloe day
No you managed to get out in one piece.
121211.content:
You struggled more as you tried to break free from the hungry cat's grasp. "Please don't eat me I beg you." You looked down at Luna's stomach as both you and her heard it growl. "Please please nothing but that."

Luna closes her maw and looks at you. "Too bad you smell wonderful." She then lifts her paw up and slips her tongue underneath you. She then yanks you up into her mouth and snaps her jaws shut around you, sealing you in the damp, darkness of her maw.

You try to get her to open her mouth as you kicked the roof of her mouth but it was no use you were about to go into the belly of a cat.

Without much hesitation and to your surprise, Luna sits up and leans her head back to swallow you down.
"Ah," she sighs happily as you slide down her throat into her waiting stomach.

You felt yourself sliding down Luna's throat and wanted to struggle but you knew it wasn't going to work considering how tight of a squeeze it was. You noticed the sounds of her body as the growling of her belly came into play as you were getting closer to it. You were then spat out into the tight and cramped belly of Luna giving you hardly enough room to move.

Luna felt you slipping down as she felt you enter her stomach. "That'll save me some trouble,You're just breakfast for now~"

You were taken by surprise at what she told you, was this all a game to her you couldn't think of what would come next, you remain silent as you felt Luna walking on the bed.

Luna stretches and purrs. "Mm I hope you don't mind staying in there, though, I'd be happy to hold on to you until lunch~"

"What no, you're going to digest me I know it!" You yelled in anger as you tried to kick the walls of her stomach, but it failed. You heard the inside Luna's belly as there was a few groans and gurgling sounds around you.

Luna then curls up on Usagi's bed and sighs calmly "I'll help myself to a nice catnap now, I'll be seeing you later on."

You pout as she said that, you had to find someway out and her Usagi to come home early or you can kiss everything good bye.

Do you find a way out or does Luna keep her word about keeping you for lunch
121211.title: Into the belly of the cat

choices: Plop, right into Luna's litterbox but nothing else came with you
You find yourself stuck in Luna's body
1212111.content:
You spend the morning and afternoon inside Luna's gurgling belly while she lounges around. It isn't long before you find yourself being dragged through her intestines.

"It's about time." You mumbled hoping she didn't hear you, but you knew you were going to be going out the back way if you didn't do something.

Luna did hear you though her ears twitched and smirked a little. "Seems it is," Luna then yawns and jumps off the bed to stretch "Ah... enjoying your stay?" She asked and prowls around the bedroom idly.

"Heck no, this is gross, first I get eaten by you because you think I'm a mouse." You said angrily."

"Well, I certainly wouldn't mind munching on you every now and again~" she purrs and licks her paw.

This got you mad, she was just play around with you like you were a piece of food. "What the hell?! I didn't ask to be your food!"

"Ah, but for now, you should be close to the end. Hope you're ready~" She crawls to her feet, waving her tail playfully behind her as she makes her way to the litterbox.

You growled as you tried to move from the cat's intestines but found yourself in a tight squeeze, you knew what was coming next.
1212111.title: Going out the back way?

choices: Run under the door and into the bathroom
Run into a mouse hole and wait till Luna's gone
You slip and Luna catches you
12121111.content:
You didn't want to go out the back you knew what was coming but you had to ask though. "So um what exactly will go on after well you know this?" You didn't get a answer from Luna as you felt your world shift.

Luna squats over the sand and tenses up to release you "Ah... either I can find out if Usagi can help you or she'll probably snack on you too, unless she'll think of you as a pet, since you're small and helpless and all that..."

You growled. "I'm not helpless, I can find for myself, I don't need anyone's help I just need to get out of here before I become someone else' snack or something."

Luna looked at you a bit confused but angry. "Well that's no way to talk to someone, if it wasn't for me finding you, Usagi would've came home and sat on you!"

You turned away from Luna and cross your arms. "Well I didn't ask to be catnip for a dumb animal either! I didn't want to become a snack for a cat and I don't want to be another snack for your owner either."

Luna was shocked after you called her dumb. "Fine if that's how you want to be, then I'll have no choice but to lock you up until then."

You turn your head in her direction and flick her off. "Try it I dare you."

Luna growled as she got ready to pounce on you again, you saw your chance to run and make it a quick one. Luna then jumped up and was about to land on you with her two front paws bu missed as you started running from the now angry cat.
12121111.title: Into the litterbox

121211113.content:
You suddenly slip as you face plant onto the floor, as Luna rolled her eyes and walked over to you and picks you up by your shirt with her mouth. You were kind of out cold for a while but open you eyes and squirm trying to get free.

"Not really sure, what to do with you now." Luna said "But lets head back to the bedroom, Usagi will be home soon anyway."

You mumble as you wait for another chance to escape, but you noticed everything was huge, beyond anything else. You knew you were screwed but didn't know how you would get home.

As you arrive back in Usagi's room, Luna hops up onto the bed and lies against one of the pillows. She lays you next to her knowing you weren't good to her after chewing her out and yelling at her, she looked out the window and finally asked.

"So then, tell me about yourself. Where are you from?" Luna asks "Hopefully from around here, or getting you home is going to be tough..."

You look at her and sigh and say
121211113.title: Caught again

choices: Luna went silent to process this
1212111132.content:
"Getting home is the hard part, don't know how I got here all I know is that where I'm from I know your name and so on." You said looking at Luna.

"As in, you knew my name before you got here?" Luna asked as she furrows her brow, starting to suspect you.

"Kind of yeah you can say that." You said hoping Luna wouldn't do anything out of the ordinary "It's a long story, but the reason why I didn't say your name before because I didn't want you to ask me a whole lot of questions, plus I was pretty mad as well."

"I could tell, but I will ask you until Usagi gets here," Luna lies back down and sighs "Hm, first question... well, how do you know all this?"

"From where I'm from all of this here and everything is part of a anime." You said truthfully wondering what Luna will say or act to what you said.
1212111132.title: Truth

12121111322.content:
"An anime? You mean like a cartoon?" Luna raises an eyebrow "If that's the case, what's special about Usagi? Surely you'd know that, if you watch everything we do on some TV show..."

You nod. "Yes a cartoon, as for Usagi. She's sailor moon, plus clumsy at times and she is the leader of the sailor scouts."

"That's pretty good..." Luna raises her eyebrows "Alright, I guess we can trust you..."

You sigh hoping she wouldn't buy it, but it was good at least, you then notice her ears perk up.

Ah, that must be Usagi!" she picks you up in her mouth and heads for the foyer.

You sigh knowing you would likely be in trouble if Usagi found out.

Luna sets you on the ground as she arrives at the front door, where Usagi is just taking off her shoes.

"Oh, hey Luna..." Usagi nods and notices you "Whatcha got there?"

"I'll let him introduce himself," Luna pushes you forward. Curious, Usagi squats down to take a closer look at you.

((Note this part leads into the Usagi choice on the choices on who finds you))
12121111322.title: Luna went silent to process this

121212.content:
Luna's ears perked up as she stopped what she was doing and looked at you. "Ah that must be Usagi now." She then picked you up with her mouth and headed to the foyer.

You sighed hoping things couldn't get any worse from here on out.

Luna sets you on the ground as she arrives at the front door, where Usagi is just taking off her shoes.

"Oh, hey Luna..." Usagi nods and notices you "Whatcha got there?"

"I'll let him introduce himself," Luna pushes you forward. Curious, Usagi squats down to take a closer look at you.

You look up at the blonde giantess and sigh. "Hello Usagi, Luna told me a little about you, I'm a tiny person, so don't think other wise, and I guess I can do what ever you want me to do."

Usagi reacts in what way?
121212.title: Telling Usagi what you are

choices: Tell her something she would remember
Ask her to pick a name for you
1212122.content:
"Aw, you're a cutie, aren'tcha?" Usagi smiles and snatches you up "It's okay, you don't have to... wait, come again?"

"He said he wouldn't mind if had him do whatever," Luna turns and heads back towards the bedroom.

"Huh?" Usagi tilts her head, befuddled. She follows Luna to her room.

"Yeah...." You said. "Anything, I mean I already told Luna, everything she wanted to hear from me on how I got here."

"I mean, I guess but I'm a bit hungry, but will you be okay? With something like that?" Usagi asks, sitting on her bed.

"What I didn't say you could eat me." You said already knowing you've been through Luna's body and certainly don't want to go through Usagi's

Usagi looks at you and tilts her head. "Oh? But you said anything so that's one thing I want to do."

You sigh as you look at the blonde giantess. "Fine."

"He's acid-proof," Luna shrugs and curls up on a pillow "You won't digest him."

"Well... if she says so," Usagi shrugs and opens her mouth "Oh, before I eat you, what's your name?"
1212122.title: Curious Usagi

choices: Stay the night what's the worse that can happen?
Wait for her to sleep and crawl out
12121221.content:
"It's a bit of a forgetful one, but trying not to steal any names but just call me Tim if you like Usagi, it'll be easier to remember." You said with a sigh.

"Tim, huh? That's gonna be kind of easy," Usagi sighs. "Well, I usually don't talk to my food, so it shouldn't be too hard. In you go, Tim!"

She opens her maw and tosses you up. You land on her tongue and bounce down into her gullet. With a delighted hum, she gulps you down and sighs contentedly.

"Ah, yummy..." she pats her tummy with a soft smile as you descend down her throat and plop down into her belly. It vibrates around you as she continues to happily rub and pat her tummy outside.

You looked around as you were now in Usagi's belly and sigh as you go to one of the walls and poke it. "I made it Usagi."

"Great!" Usagi lies down and continues massaging her belly "You were nice and yummy, Tim! Luna, you said he..."
"Won't be digested?"

Luna yawns "Dunno why, he is immune to it."

"Great, so he can stay in there all night, right?" Usagi grins.

"I mean, yeah, I guess..." Luna curls up and sighs.

Your eyes widen when you heard her say the night, you had three options now which one would you decide on?
12121221.title: Into Usagi's belly you go

choices: The girls stay silent and finally spoke
Usagi's stomach sloshs you about as it got shooked
121212211.content:
You get a restful sleep for what feels like a few hours, but in time you are woken up as you hear the sounds of conversation outside and... well, what sounds like chewing. Soon, chewed-up sugar cookies fall down into Usagi's stomach.

"Usagi, you pig!" one voice shouts "Are you paying attention?"

"I am, I am!" Usagi pouts and continues munching.

You sighed and knew this wasn't going to end well for you, you did notice the voices but don't say anything but noticed it was getting a bit smaller in Usagi's belly and finally spoke. "Hey Usagi did you forget about something?!"

"What was that?" one voice asks.

"Oh... shoot..." Usagi slaps her forehead and sets the cookies aside "I'm sorry, uh... Tim, was it? I didn't mean it, I just got hungry!"

"You're always hungry," someone snickers "And who's talking to you, Usagi?"

"Um... well, I... kinda ate someone earlier, and..." Usagi looks down sheepishly at her stomach.

"What? Why would you do that?" another voice asks, then taps on Usagi's tummy "Hello? Anyone in there?"

"Hello, I can hear you all just fine really, Rei, Ami Minako and Makoto." You said. "Yes I know all your names as well."

What happens next?
121212211.title: Usagi's belly gotten cramped

choices: You make it out in one piece
Usagi gagged and accidentally swallows you
1212122111.content:
the girls stay silent for a moment and you then heard two of them speak.

"Huh?" Ami said as she tilts her head.

You rolled your eyes as you heard Ami say that and heard Rei next.

"Sounds like you have a spy in your belly," Rei pokes Usagi's tummy "Well, in that case, you can keep eating, Usagi."

"No no, he's not a spy!" Usagi shakes her head "But, I do wanna keep eating..." She holds up a cookie and thinks for a bit.

"Usagi, if you want to eat more let me out first okay?" You asked trying to avoid getting smothered by the cookies "At least give me a few minutes to introduce myself to the others."

"Oh, alright," she stands up and pats her tummy "Hold on everyone, I'm gonna go let Tim out." She hurries off to the bathroom.

You waited for a moment and thought to myself on what way she'd get me out, you pushed away a few of the chewed up cookies that was sloshed over to you when Usagi patted her belly, you mumbled under your breath and then felt your world shake.

Usagi steps into the bathtub and lies down flat on her back. "I don't wanna make myself sick, so..." she pats her tummy "Can you just climb up?"

You groaned a little but looked up at the entrance of her stomach which was the exit of Usagi's throat. "Yeah I guess I can do that Usagi." With that said you started to make your way up her throat.

What happens next?
1212122111.title: Heard by Ami and Rei

choices: You took the rest off and Usagi puts you in
You wait and think for a moment
12121221111.content:
She grabs a tissue and spits you into it, drying you off. "Ugh... definitely better going down," she wipes her lips and sets you on the counter "Alright, want me to wash you off? You gotta get undressed if you do."

You raised an eyebrow and looked at her. "If you're okay with seeing me naked then okay." I said. "I mean I would need new clothing anyway."

"You're already pretty tiny, so it doesn't matter to me," Usagi shrugs "I'll see if I have some doll clothes for you." She then plugs up the sink and runs the faucet at a lukewarm temperature, slowly filling it up.

You think for a moment and looked at the blonde. "Hey Usagi, I have a question"

"What's up?" she asks as she shuts off the faucet.

"Why is it that when I say no to something you do the opposite?" You asked her as you took your shirt off.

"You mean like eating you?" Usagi asked. "I don't know I mean Luna did say you were indigestible so there's that, unless you want to other scouts to see if they'd want to eat you?"

You sighed and looked at the blonde giantess. "Yeah sure fine whatever."

"Um, I don't know... maybe? You'd have to ask them personally. They probably wouldn't mind it, since Luna and I can tell them you're indigestible, but I don't know how eager each one would be... scrumptious as you look~" She said as pushes your shirt to the side and waits for you to keep undressing.
12121221111.title: You make it out in one piece

choices: Usagi picks you up and takes you out to the others
You look at Usagi again while thinking of something
121212211111.content:
"Perhaps....but I guess I could ask Minako first and see." You said. "Where's Chibi Usa?"

"She's around... somewhere," Usagi shrugs "Why, are you looking for her to eat you too? I'll let you wash yourself off..." she lets go of you, letting you stand in the chest-high water.

Once you finish undressing, she picks you up and gently lowers you into the lukewarm bath she's prepared in the sink.

"No it's not that, but she might try to you never know, she'd see me more as a gummy treat then a person." You said a little uneasy about that thought as you started washing yourself clean.

"You seem awful quiet..." she laughs to herself "Have you always been this way, or did winding up in our world mess you up? Not that I mind, really..."

"It's nothing really, I mean there's really nothing I can think of really." You said. "Usagi I know I'm not fond of being anyone's snack but I guess it would be safe if I had to be kept safe inside you or the others if something came up that was for your job's."

"I guess that's true," Usagi nods and finishes washing you "Never thought my stomach would be a safe place, but you do have a point..." She pulls you gently out of the water and sets you down on a dry washcloth.

You smiled a little and looked at her. "Thank you Usagi"

"It's no problem," she dries you off and sets you by your clothes "Here, go ahead and get dressed before I bring you out to meet everyone."

You nod and get dressed, and think about something while you put your shirt on.
121212211111.title: You took the rest off and Usagi puts you in

1212122111111.content:
Usagi notices at your sudden stop. "You seem pensive, Moon," she picks you up as you finish "Something on your mind?"

"Just thinking but I guess we could play a game later." You said looking at the blonde.

"A game, huh? Like what?" Usagi asks as she holds you closer up to her face.

You think a bit more until you finally decide.
"Well I know Luna is around and wouldn't mind the game but what about cat and mouse?"

"You mean with all of us, not just Luna?" Usagi nods to herself "I guess we could do that. First I should introduce you to them, though." With that, she heads out of the bathroom with you in hand and returns to the living room.

"So this is the guy you ate?" Ami raises an eyebrow as Usagi sets you on the table "Well then, you said all our names earlier. What else do you know?" She leans forward on the table and glares down at you.

"Oh, relax, Ami, he's too small to be any harm to us~" Rei chuckles.

"Yeah I just wanted to meet you all really." You said. And I wanted to ask a few other things as well if you girls are okay with it."

"Ask us stuff? I thought our lives were an anime for you!" Usagi raises her eyebrow.

"Huh?" Ami tilts her head.

"Yeah, he told me he knew about us from an anime," Usagi nods affirmatively.

"Well, if that's true," Rei raises a finger "Then there's only so much an anime can show. It probably only shows one character at a time, and not even all his/her inner thoughts at that. Plus, what if he hasn't caught up yet?"

"Fair point," Usagi leans back "Alright then, ask away, Tim"

"You already know what I said when you took me out of the bathroom Usagi." You pointed out. "You know the game."

Oh," Usagi nods "Right, he wants to play a game of cat and mouse."

"Seriously? He wants to goof off just like Usagi does..." Makoto shakes her head.

"He's not as distracting as Usagi is, though," Minako nods "Given how small he is. Anyone want to volunteer to be his cat?"

"Why not Usagi?" Ami nods to the blonde.

"I already had my fill of him for now," Usagi pats her belly "Maybe later."

"I'll do it!" Rei smiles and picks you up "I'll catch up with you guys after our game's over. C'mon Tim~" She stands up and carries you out of the room.
"So, how do you want this to go down? Should I give you a 10-second headstart? Do you want me to crawl on all fours?" she asks you as she sits down on a set of stairs in the foyer.

"10 second head start yeah and as for the chasing part you can do which ever." You said looking at her.

"Alright then, I'll go on all fours for fun~" Rei crouches down and covers her eyes "Alrighty, here's your head-start. Ten~ Nine~ Eight~" She continues counting down from there.

You start running as I look for a place to sneak into.

Do you find a place to hide?

(This goes into Rei's side of the story so you have to go back to the start)
1212122111111.title: Usagi picks you up and takes you out to the others

choices: Ask the three to keep a sceret
121231.content:
Alrighty, here goes~" she passes you under the stream. Her fingers set about quickly yet vigorously scrubbing you off before she shuts off the water. She gives you a similarly fast dry-off on her chest before she holds you up to her face.

"Alrighty Tim, ready to hop in?" she licks her lips eagerly.

You nod. "Yes Ami I'm ready." You looked at her face and then at her mouth.

"Alrighty, in you go then~" Ami presses you against her tongue and shuts her mouth around you. Once you're sealed in the damp darkness of her maw, she starts to poke and prod you with her tongue. With a satisfied hum, she presses you up against her palate to savor you for a minute before she tosses her head back to gulp you whole.

"Ah..." Ami pats her tummy below you "Scrumptious! Thanks, Tim!"

You slid down Ami's throat as you heard her humming and felt her pat her stomach, you then eventually arrive inside it as you looked around her spacious stomach. "Well, that was actually fun."

"Glad you enjoyed the ride down!" Ami sits down on her couch and massages her tummy some more "After all, if you're going to stick around here, this certainly won't be the last time I eat you..."

"Kinda bizarre, isn't it?" Rei sits down beside her "This little guy just popped up today, and now we're all... well, snacking on him."

"Well, I don't mind more snacks..." Usagi grins and stares off into space.

"Of course you don't Usagi." You said from Ami's belly.

"So..." Ami pats her tummy "While he's in there, shall we work on some homework?"

"Hm?" Usagi looks up "Oh, well... usually I just put on the TV for a while, but..."

"You should get it done now, Usagi," Rei flicks her friend in the forehead "Not that I have the same workload as you guys, but I'll stick around to help."

And so, they set about working on their homework and studying while you rest inside of Ami's belly.

You listened to what the three talked about more as you rubbed the walls of Ami's belly.

After an hour or so in her belly, it jiggles around you.

"How's it going in there, Tim?" Ami asks "You've been quiet for a while now."

"I'm fine, just listening to what you girls were talking about, I did hear about more missions but that's about it." You said.

"Heh, well, at least you're alright," Ami pats her tummy "Do you need anything while you're in there? We'll probably be at this for another couple hours."

"Maybe some food please." You said.

"Okay! I'll gulp down a couple candy bars," she gets up and heads for her kitchen "I'll keep them in the wrappers so you can have them fresh." She opens her cabinet and grabs a couple of mini Twix bars. She opens her mouth wide and swallows them one after the other. They land in her belly beside you after a couple seconds. "Oof..." she sighs after shutting the closet "That alright, Tim?"

You smiled. smiled and take them. "Thanks Ami."

Ami returns to the living room to resume the homework session.

"Oh, Tim!" Usagi perks up and pats Ami's belly "You recall when I said said you could get Chibiusa to eat you, right? I think she should be off school soon, so we can arrange for her to snack on you."

"We could hide you in a bag of snacks~" Rei chuckles.

"That might work." You said. "Have her be unexpected about me until I start talking to her after I'm in her tummy."

"Oh, gonna spook her?" Ami asks "Alrighty then. I'll send her a text to meet up at my place. We'll have some business to take care of this evening, anyway, so it all works out."

"You might spend the next mission in her belly," Rei laughs to herself.

"Okay then." You said. "But you three are cool."

"Heheh, thanks, Tim!" Ami replies, stroking her tummy "You're pretty cool too."

"Cool? He's a snack!" Usagi smirks.

"He's cool for letting us eat him~" Rei adds.
121231.title: Ami's side (Into her belly you go)

choices: Chibiusa comes home in time to gobble you up unawear (Go to Chibiusa's part)
1212311.content:
"Um....can you three maybe keep a secret?" You asked as you leaned against Ami's stomach wall.

Usagi cocks an eyebrow as she looks at Ami and Rei.

"You can count on us!" Ami answers as she rubs her belly looking down at it.

"Scout's honor, if you will," Rei adds. "So what is it you need to ask Tim?"

You blushed and begin to stutter a little. "We....well I kind of like like Minako."

The three girls smiled as Ami had her eye's locked onto her belly still. "Aw, that's... cute?" She then shakes her head a bit "Well, a little weird, since you know her, but she doesn't... know you."

"Well, he did say we live in one of his anime," Rei shrugs "We'll sneak you into her stomach once Chibiusa's done with you, if you want!"

"I'm a little insulted that I'm the main character, and he prefers someone else!" Usagi pouts.

"Oh please, Usagi, you were much more interested in eating him than dating him," Rei bops her on the head.

You then felt a little guilty after saying and hearing what they said "Yeah, sorry about that there Usagi, you're goofy and all but hey we can be friends still."You said. "If that's still a option...."

"It's alright," Usagi shrugs, rubbing her head "But, why do you like Minako? Just curious, is all."

"Well.....She's pretty and cute." You said. "And to add to that she's awesome, but you all are still awesome to me."

"Well, I wasn't expecting much else," Ami shrugs "Anyway, Chibiusa should be on her way now. Wanna come out and hide in her snack?"

You think for a moment and had to admit this was pretty fun getting to know the girls even if you didn't like how things went first hand and looked up. "Yes, though I will miss you three, but that doesn't mean I can't see you lot again."

"Well, you'll probably rotate staying at each of our houses," Ami notes as she stands up "So you'll see plenty of us!" She heads into the bathroom and, as your previous predators have done, lies face-down in the bathtub."Alright Tim, ready when you are~" Ami opens her mouth and waits patiently.

You make my way out of Ami's body as you reach the inside of her mouth.

Ami reaches up to grab some tissues and spits you into them, gently wiping you off. "Hah..." she stands up and takes a breath "Better going down than coming up... do you want me to wash you up, real quick?"

You nod your head. "Yes please Ami."

"Gotcha," she steps out of the tub and plugs up the sink, filling it with lukewarm water. Unlike Usagi, she gently removes your clothes for you, though she does avert her eyes, somewhat politely. She snaps off a piece of soap and, after turning the water off, proceeds to gently scrub you using the miniature bath she's filled for you.

You blush a bit and smile. "Thanks Ami."

"No problem, Tim," Ami nods, draining the sink and grabbing a washcloth to dry you off "Ah... there we are. Go ahead and get dressed." She then sets you back down, next to your clothes."So, what snack do you think you'd like to hide in?" she asks.

"Well knowing ChibiUsa she would go for a bag of candy." You said.

"How about a bag of gummy worms?" Ami smiles and carries you into the kitchen, and opens up her pantry to inspect her selection of candy.

You nod in agreement. "Okay then just hope she doesn't chew me."

"Relax," Ami takes out a bag of gummy worms and opens it up "Just get down her throat as fast as possible, okay? Here, I'll cast a little charm to make you bite-proof." She waves her fingers, causing you to briefly glow. "There, you'll still feel pain, but your body will be completely fine," Ami nods, dangling you over the opened bag "Heheh, good thing you're so small. I don't have to use nearly as much magic while I work with you." She then drops you into the bag, letting you land comfortably on the chewy treats. Ami waves her fingers again, then draws them over the opening of the candy bag, causing it to seal up as though it'd never been opened. "Heh, I could get used to this," Ami laughs, then reaches into the fridge to grab a juice box "Welp, Chibiusa should be here any minute now. Hope you're ready!" With that, she heads back into the living room and sets you on the other end of the coffee table from Usagi and Rei, who only chuckle as they see Ami set you down for Chibi to eat.
1212311.title: Ask the three to keep a sceret

choices: You spend the rest of the afternoon in Makoto's belly
You decide to explore Makoto's belly
121232.content:
After Chibiusa had dried you off she takes you back to the others.

"Alright then," she slips you into her pocket. She heads into the living room, where everyone else is. After sitting down on the couch, she takes you out and puts you on the coffee table.

"Moon's out," she says, lying back.

"Hey Moon!" Ami smiles "How was your stay with Chibi?" Usagi and Rei also wave to you, while Makoto and Minako eye you curiously.

You wave back at them as you see Makoto lean in closer.

Makoto would then smile a bit. "Oh wow he reminds me of one of my old boyfriend's, interesting."

"Doesn't all boys remind you of your old boyfriends?" Rei said.

You then looked back at Ami and your previous owners who kept you in their bellies. "It was good actually, and I will pick Makoto next, because I'll save Minako for last if that's fine with you two?"

What?" Makoto perked up, confused.

"What's all this picking and saving about?" Minako asked "Who is that? What are we doing? How does he know us?"

"One question at a time," Rei takes you off the table and hands you to Makoto "How about you explain yourself real quick, Tim? It's a weird story, but we've dealt with weirder."

"Tim?" Makoto took you into her hands "That's... an odd name. Do I know you from somewhere? Because that does sound like one of my old boyfriends names."

"No, but long story short or as short as I can make it. I wounded up here in your guy's world, and I was at Usagi's place, so one thing led to another, Usagi ate me, then Rei did, followed by Ami, and a few hours or so it was ChibUsa, but I'm cleaned however so, as Usagi would say, can't let a good snack go to waste."You said.

"Usagi would say that," Makoto chuckled "Alright, well... if that's the trend, then I guess I'll... eat you... now?" She opened her mouth, still a little wary of you. Nonetheless, she set you on her tongue and swallowed you down. "Ah..." she sighed, smiling "Kinda sweet... wish I'd savored you more." She follows the bulge in her throat with her finger down to her gut, stopping as you land in her tummy. "Uh, so..." she pats her belly "Enjoy the ride?"

"I did yes." You said. "It's roomy in here like Rei's and Ami's."

What?" Makoto pokes her tummy "You callin' me fat?"

"Heh," Rei chuckles "No, he means we don't eat as much as Usagi does."

"Oh, well..." Makoto laughs too "Glad you're comfy."

Yeah that was a complement." You said relaxing as you smiled a bit.
121232.title: Makoto see's you as one of her old boyfriends

121233.content: Two more to pick now
121233.title: More

1212331.content:
Rei continues counting down to one.
"Ready or not, here I come, li'l mousey!" Rei starts crawling around, playfully pretending to sniff out your scent as she does.

You were hiding under the table with a toy covering you, you waited to see if Rei would take notice.

She spots the toy underneath the table and grins.
"Oh? What have we here~?" she bats away the toy and spots you "Gotcha, mousey!" She swipes you off the ground and holds you up.
"Heh, that was almost too easy!" she chuckles "Now what? Do you want to play again?"

"Actually." You said looking at Rei's face. "Rules are for the game if the cat finds the mouse it eats it."

"Huh? Eat you?" she asks "...well, I am the cat, and you are the mouse, in this game, so... well, it's only fitting, isn't it?" She chuckles playfully and opens her maw up.
"In ya go, mousey~" she slides you gently onto her tongue, sealing her lips up behind you. You hear a euphonious hum all around you as she enjoys your flavor. Seeking more of it, her tongue starts to dance underneath you, trying to roll and swish you around to get at every last inch of you.

You lightly chuckle as you got tickled by Rei's tongue and smirked a little knowing she was enjoying the taste, which was odd for you to enjoy.

"Mm..." she tilts her head back, letting you slide down into her gullet before she simply swallows you whole "Ah... yummy mousey~" She traces your bulge in her throat down until it disappears behind her chest. As her esophagus unceremoniously drops you into her stomach, you feel it shake and vibrate as she pats her tummy on the outside. There's some leftover rice from lunch surrounding you, but her belly is otherwise relatively empty.
"Comfy, Tim?" she asks "I have to admit, I enjoyed you more than I thought I would!"

"Yeah I'm comfy oddly enough Rei, I think your stomach is more roomy aside from having been inside Usagi's but yeah I like it" You said.

"Well, that's not a compliment you get every day..." she chuckles awkwardly and pats her tummy "But, I'm glad you enjoy it! Just holler if you need me, okay?"

"Okay." You said. "By the way Rei, are you and the other girls going to do anything else?"

Uh, that depends how the day goes, but otherwise, I don't think we had anything else planned besides the usual talks we have..." Rei scratches her head.

"I see, well I did tell Usagi that I would have to be in one of your bellies if you all had to go out and fight." You said.

"Well I don't see why you couldn't just stick around at home, but I guess there's no harm in it..." she shrugs and heads back for the living room.

You waited a little bit before saying something else to Rei, and heard commotion outside her belly.

"Oh, Rei! You're just in time," you hear Ami say "Look what's on the news!" Rei looks at the TV and gasps.

"Goodness! We oughta go help," she pats her tummy "Well Tim, looks like you're in for a rough ride already."

"...You ate him?" Ami asks, bewildered.

"Uh, yeah..." Rei chuckles "Kinda comes with the cat-and-mouse game... y'know, cat eats the mouse..."

"Huh, make sense," Ami shrugs, then pokes Rei's belly "Tim, do you think you'll be okay in there while we go off to fight?"

"I'll be fine yes." You said

"Okay then," Ami shrugs, as does Rei "Let's go!" The sailor scouts rush out of Usagi's house to the scene of the ensuing debacle. As Rei runs, you bounce around her shifting, shaking belly.

You wait it out as you relaxed the best you could inside Rei's belly.

The ensuing fight takes about a half-hour before it's all over. Once they head back for home, Rei pats her belly.
"Ah, are you alright in there, Tim?" she asks "Hope that wasn't too rough for you..."

"No it was kind of fun odd enough getting tossed around in here." You said hugging the wall.

"Oh! Well, I'm glad to hear that..." Rei pats her tummy.

"What a strange guy," Ami chuckles "Not only does he like being eaten, he likes getting tossed around while he's at it! I'd almost say he's got a penchant for being food... Tim, did you get eaten like this back in your homeworld?" She bends down and pokes Rei's belly.

"Hmm no that's never happened, this is a first really." You said.

"No? Well, that only makes things even stranger..." Ami shrugs "Ah well, I suppose we'd better head home for the evening. I guess you'll have no problem sleeping in Rei's tummy, right?"

"Huh?" Rei blushed "Um... well, I guess that's no problem for me, but... wow, that's weird..."

"Oh? Would you prefer he sleep in mine, instead?" Ami patted her own belly.

"I mean... if he wants to?" Rei looked down "Which do you prefer, Tim?"

"Well Usagi does want to see if you all like me in your tummies so.....I'll go with you Ami." You said.

"Huh, well, guess I oughta let you out..." Rei shrugs "Alright Ami, guess you're coming home with me. Usagi, care to join us?"

"Sure! I don't have anything else to do!" Usagi skips over to the two.

"Besides your homework?" Luna mumbles quietly, following behind.

You waited as you sat in Rei's belly wondering if things well be okay later on.

Alright, so..." Rei pats her tummy as they arrive at her house "...how is he, uh... getting out?"

"You're gonna have to spit him up," Usagi slips off her shoes "Go and lie down somewhere with a napkin so he can crawl up your throat."

"Oh, okay," Rei sighs calmly "Thought I'd have to gag myself..." She heads for the bathroom and acquires a paper towel.

"Alright Tim, c'mon up," she lies down flat in her empty tub and opens her mouth over the towel.

You make your way up and out of Rei's body and get onto the towel, you then looked around as you then looked up at her. "That was nice."

Rei clears her throat and sits up.
"Glad you enjoyed it..." she lifts you up in the towel and offers you to Ami "Here ya go... wash him off first..."

"Righty-o!" Ami happily accepts you and brings you over to the sink while Rei hops out of the tub. She turns on the sink, creating a moderate stream of warm water.

"Ready to be washed off, Tim?" Ami asks with a cheery smile "I'll be nice and quick with it!"

You nod. "Yes I'm ready to be cleaned Ami."




(Very short I know, but this was how much Rei had time to shine in the rp I'm doing for the stories, go back and pick Ami's part)
1212331.title: Hide under the table, into Rei's belly you go

choices: Shrug it off and squrim in Chibiusa's small belly
1212332.content:
After having been dropped into soon to be Chibiusa's snack of sweet treats, you began to look around the bag. "Hmm I know I'm going to end up smelling and tasting fruity."

In time, there's a knock on the door. Ami gets up to answer it, greets Chibiusa, and lets her in.

"How was school, kiddo?" Usagi asks.

"Oh, you know, boring as ever," Chibi replies, entering the living room "I should be well past my PhD by now, but I need to blend in."

"Well, help yourself to a snack," Ami pats her little friend's head and gestures to the bag you're hidden in "Maybe a bit of brain food is what you need~"

"Hm, candy's not really brain food, but I do like my sweets," Chibi nods "Thanks, Ami!" She picks up the bag and juicebox and sits down on the couch. She promptly opens the bag and starts munching on the gummy worms around you. Soon enough, you end up in one of her handfuls, and, totally unknown to her, get stuck right on her tongue. While the rest of the worms get chewed up, you manage to slide down her throat, unharmed.

"Ah..." Chibi sighs "Huh, sweeter than normal." She shrugs, and the girls all continue chatting away over homework.

You eventually plopped into Chibiusa's small belly as you looked around you heard the girls giggle a little as you were waiting for the right moment to surprise her.

"Thanks for the snack, Ami," Chibiusa smiles and gets up to throw away the bag, bouncing you around in her stomach as she walks.

"No problem," Ami nodded, stifling a chuckle.

"Alright, so what are you guys studying for?" Chibiusa sits on the couch and looks over at the notes on the table.

"Calc," Rei grabs a piece of paper and hands it to her, also holding back a laugh "Mind taking a look at this problem? It's had us scratching our heads..."

"Sure, let's see..." she took the paper and held it up to read it, all the while gently rubbing her tummy.

You sat in Chibiusa's belly waiting for a bit more time.

"...So it's really not that hard, once you see that it's just a trig substitution mixed with integration by parts, it's just that those are really tedious ways of solving these integrals," Chibiusa shrugs "To be honest, it'd be better to get one of these simple, but long problems instead getting totally stumped."

"Well, it had me stumped..." Usagi frowns.

"Well then, it's a good thing you're studying, dumpling-head!" Chibiusa sticks her tongue out "Alright, any other problems?"
1212332.title: Chibiusa comes home in time for her snack

choices: ChibiUsa leaves school as it ends
12123321.content:
You sat in Chibiusa's belly waiting for a bit more time then unexpected.

"...so it's really not that hard, once you see that it's just a trig substitution mixed with integration by parts, it's just that those are really tedious ways of solving these integrals," Chibiusa shrugs "To be honest, it'd be better to get one of these simple, but long problems instead getting totally stumped."

"Well, it had me stumped..." Usagi frowns.

"Well then, it's a good thing you're studying, dumpling-head!" Chibiusa sticks her tongue out "Alright, any other problems?"

You shrug and squirm around in her belly hoping to surprise her with your movement.

Chibiusa jumps as you startle her. "Huh?" she pats her tummy "Wh... oh..." The girls chuckle quietly to themselves, inviting an indignant glare from Chibiusa. "What's so funny?!" she demands "You better not have spiked my juice with anything funny!"

You stay quiet for a bit and then chuckle as well. "No no one messed with your juice."

"Oh, well that's good to..." Chibiusa looks around curiously "Hey! Who said that?!"

"In your belly." You said hoping she heard you or not.

"Yeah, okay, that’s enough messing around," Chibiusa stands up and looks around "Who are you? Are you in the closet or something?" She starts walking around.

"Chibi…" Ami covers her mouth as she laughs "He’s not lying. He’s really in your stomach."

"What?! When did you get in there?!" Chibi pats her tummy and stares at it for a bit "You better not be plotting anything! I’ll drink a hot chocolate if you are!"

"Whoa feisty little one." You said with a chuckle. "I was in your snack bag."

"And just what were you doing in there?" Chibi pats her tummy again, sternly.

"Relax, Chibi," Rei nods "We put him there. It was just a little prank."

"Well that's very funny," Chibi looks up at Rei, not amused "So he's just in there, now? Is he even going to be okay? Am I going to get sick?"

"What a worry-wart," Ami laughs "Hard to believe your Usagi's kid! You'll be fine. He's indigestible, and clean. He doesn't mind, either. Isn't that right, Tim?"

"Yep, I don't mind at all, even if it took a good while to get used to the idea." You said.

"Uh... you sure?" Chibi asks "What kind of person doesn't mind being eaten?"

"That kind!" Ami pokes Chibi's tummy, much to the latter's chagrin.

"And Time? Is he related to anything like the Silver Crystal?" Chibi continues.

"Far as we know, no," Usagi shakes her head "He just appeared in my house, that small. Luna found him first, and since then, we've..."

"We've found out he quite likes to be eaten," Rei adds "And apparently, he's from a dimension where we, and our adventures and stuff, are all an anime to him."

"An anime?!" Chibi asks "Where's the camera?" She starts looking around the room.

"Silly, you don't film an anime," Ami chuckles.

"She's right,." You said. "Think of it like a cartoon you would watch ChibiUsa, and you were pulled into that certain cartoon and you told them the same they'll be confused like how everyone here was until it gets to a understanding."

"Well, if you put it that way, then..." Chibiusa scratches her head "Well, it doesn't matter. You're here now, and I don't know about sending you back to your homeworld. Besides..." She pats her tummy.
"I think I rather like having you in there," she smiles softly.

"Well, this has been quite a day," Usagi stands up and yawns "I think I've had enough studying for one day."

"Much as I'd make fun of you," Ami checks her watch "It is getting late. We oughta head home for now."

"Alright then," Rei shuts her notebook "Thanks for coming, guys!"

"See you tomorrow~" Usagi packs her stuff up and heads for the door, with Chibi and Ami following suit.

You smiled a bit as you heard what Chibiusa said as you got comfy and snuggled against her stomach wall.

"Mm, this is gonna take some getting used to," Chibi patted her tummy as they walked down the sidewalk.

"Hm? Yeah, he's just getting comfortable," Usagi shrugged. In time, they arrived at their house.

"So, how long were you planning on staying in there?" Chibiusa asks as she gets settled into her bedroom.

"Hmm, well Ami did say that I'll have to stick around in here for a bit when it comes to fights, but I think at the next group up you can let me out so I can go to Makoto or Minako." You said.

"The next group-up?" Chibi raises an eyebrow "So... you know that means you'll be in there until tomorrow afternoon, maybe evening... right?"

"Well, not like he's got anywhere else to be..." Luna jumps up on Chibi's bed and gets comfortable.

"Yeah I know, I'm sure your stomach wouldn't mind some company for the whole day." You said.

"I mean..." Chibiusa shrugs "Well, alright then. As long as you behave yourself, okay?" She smiles and proceeds to change into her pajamas. "Ah..." she slides under her covers and gets comfortable "Well, good night, Tim."

"Good night Chibiusa." You said.

You spend a restful night inside of Chibiusa's stomach. In the morning, you awaken to the sound of her showering. After finishing, you hear her brush her teeth for a few minutes and exit the bathroom. Your surroundings tremble as she pats her tummy from the outside.

"You awake in there, Time?" you hear her ask.

"Yeah I'm awake Chibiusa, did you sleep well last night?" You asked nuzzling the wall of her belly. "I slept peacefully in here I can tell you that much."

"I slept well, thanks," she nods "Still a bit weird to carry you around like this, but... well, it's also nice, in a way. I don't have time for breakfast, so I'll just have a protein bar and some juice. Look out below, alright?" She enters the kitchen to pour herself a glass of juice and opens the pantry to find a bar.

You moved to another part of chibiusa's belly to be out of the way so I wouldn't get hit with the protein bar and juice

Her breakfast comes down momentarily, while you stay safely off to one side. Her tummy quakes as she pats it outside.

"I'm heading to school now. Do you need anything before I go?" she asks "I can't talk to you while I'm out of the house, and... well, try not to move around too much, okay?"

You take some of the food and eat. "Hmm no I don't need anything else ChibiUsa"

"Alrighty then," she gives her belly one more pat before heading for the door "I'm off!" With that, she departs for school. She walks at a leisurely pace—evidently not excited for classes—, which makes your ride quite smooth and comfortable.
12123321.title: Shrug it off and squrim in Chibiusa's small...

121233211.content:
You relax inside her belly as I listened to my surroundings, as I was thinking on what me and ChibiUsa could do when she got home later after school.

The day passes, and soon, Chibiusa is out of class. She makes her way home, but on the way, she's interrupted as someone taps her shoulder from behind.
"Usagi?" she asks.

"No time to explain!" Usagi runs ahead "Follow us!" You hear a few other girls run past Chibiusa.

"Hold on tight, Tim," she pats her tummy, takes a breath, and dashes off to follow the girls to wherever they were headed. You hear some fighting outside, but you're too busy being shaken and jostled around inside Chibiusa to make out exactly what's happening.

You got sloshed around as you could hear all of this going on, it didn't help much as her belly was small and tight as you made small bumps in her belly.

The fight subsides in time, the sailors recuperate.

"Well, that's that," Usagi dusts her hands "Anyone wanna hang?"

"I'm down to relax for a bit," Minako says "My place is free, if you guys wanna come." The sailors all more or less nod in agreement, and set off for Minako's house. Chibiusa rubs her tummy as she carries you along.

"I guess I go to her next huh?" You asked Chibiusa

"Her, or Makoto," Chibi whispered "Your choice."

"I'll save Minako for last."You said. "Makoto can be next."


"Okay then," Chibi nods quietly and continues following the other sailor scouts. In time, you arrive at Minako's house. Everyone gets settled in the living room, except for Chibiusa, who heads for the bathroom. "Ready to come out?" she asks quietly.

"Yes, I'm ready to come out." You said.

Chibi lies prone in the bathtub and taps her tummy.
"Alright, crawl up when you're ready," she says, bracing herself.

You start climbing up to Chibi Usa's throat as you go inside it and kept climbing.

As soon as you arrive in her mouth, she spits you into her palm and stands back up.

"Eugh... I imagine you'd taste better going down," she shakes her head "Anyway, let's clean you up..." She heads over to the sink and washes you off. "Alright... so, how would you like to introduce yourself?" she asks as she dries you off "I imagine you didn't surprise Usagi or the other girls, like you did me."

"No, it's a long story really." You said. "I'll just show myself to Makoto and knowing her, she'll see me as one of her old boyfriend's."

(Go back to the Makoto option.)
121233211.title: ChibiUsa leaves school as it ends

1231.title: Super Mario universe

12311.content:
You find yourself on a smooth, white tile floor. The ceiling looks to be extremely far away, and the furniture serms much larger than it should be...or are you just tiny?

Exploring the area as best as you can, you notice a wooden table with a snack bowl resting atop its surface. Feeling a bit hungry, you scale the table's leg in hopes of securing some food. It takes a while, but you eventually make it onto the table, taking a moment to catch your breath. Just then, you hear a door open and hide in the bowl of snacks, as someone enters the room...
12311.title: Peach's Castle

choices: ...turns to walk to the stairs. You're safe.
123111.content: You hear the sound of high heels clacking against the tile floor, as well as a feminine hum as a giantess with blonde hair, blue eyes, and a pink dress enters the room. You quickly recognize this woman as Princess Peach, the ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom. The princess walks toward your snack bowl hideaway and...
123111.title: The Mushroom Kingdom Princess

1232.content: Okay so Zelda gameverse where exactly do you wake up at?
1232.title: Legend of Zelda universe

12321.content:
You awoke to a wet area and found it soft and bouncy, as you were about to stand up you were knocked back down by something, as you heard thumping and growling around you.

You then realized where exactly you were at but who are you inside of exactly?
12321.title: Someone's stomach

1233.content: What about these options? If you haven't heard of any I'd look them up
1233.title: More games

12331.content: You wake up a messy room of some sort as you sat up to look around to figure out where you were at, but before you could stand up you hear mumbling a girl mumble at that, as you turned your head to see who was in the room with you, your jaw dropped to see.
12331.title: Life is Strange

12332.content: Which Overwatch chick spots you?
12332.title: Overwatch

123321.content:
Tracer was getting ready for capture the objective when she suddenly stumbled upon you in your tiny state as she examined you to find you were out cold but breathing.

Tracer didn't say anything as she lifted you up and went off to one of the other rooms to call in for a no go. You were wakened as you heard the British tone of Tracer's voice.

"Ugh my head what happened?" You asked looking around not noticing Tracer. "Wait what did happen and where am I?"

Tracer looked down at you and sighed of relief. "Oh you're awake there good you had me worried for a bit."

You were startled by the booming voice as you looked up and saw Tracer looking down at you. "Whoa...."

Tracer raises an eyebrow. "Something the matter love? If you think I'm going to hurt you I wont."

Suddenly you both heard a sound before you could say anything you realized what it was.
123321.title: Cheers love the cavalry's here

12333.content: Tons of game's to pick, try not to be picky eh?
12333.title: Next

Perhaps I should've been more specific in terms of the game...

How about Awakening, for the 3DS?
